 LINE/W%%DOCU
 LINE>0U1FORM : YCH02_04_MEDRUCK
 LINEASPurchase orders
 LINE>1U1PAGE : FIRST
 LINEASFirst page.
 LINE>2U1PAGE : NEXT
 LINEASSubsequent page.
 LINE>3U1WINDOW : ADDRESS
 LINEASAddress window of document. Principally contains the vendor's address.
 LINEASOn the first page, the address of the purchasing organization is
 LINE  additionally outputted above the vendor's address. This address is
 LINE  stored as standard text T024E-TXADR, which you assign in the IMG via the
 LINE  step <LS>Message determination -> Texts for messages -> Texts for
 LINE  purchasing organization</> on the detail screen (<LS>Text for address</>
 LINE  field).
 LINEASNote that the window on the subsequent pages (page NEXT) is only three
 LINE  lines high, so that individual lines of the vendor's address may be
 LINE  omitted.
 LINE>4U1WINDOW : CONSGNEE
 LINEASShip-to (consignee's) address.
 LINE>3U1WINDOW : DELDATE
 LINEASDelivery dates.
 LINE>4U1WINDOW : FOOTER
 LINEASFooter lines.
 LINE>3U1WINDOW : HEADER
 LINEASHeader lines/logo.
 LINE>4U1WINDOW : INFO
 LINEASGeneral information - right.
 LINE>3U1WINDOW : INFO1
 LINEASGeneral information - left.
 LINE>4U1WINDOW : INFO2
 LINEASGeneral information - right.
 LINE>3U1WINDOW : IN_WORDS
 LINE*
 LINE>4U1WINDOW : LOGO
 LINE*
 LINE>3U1WINDOW : MAIN
 LINEASMain window.
 LINE>4U1WINDOW : PAGE
 LINEASPage number.
 LINE>3U1WINDOW : SENDER
 LINE*
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : DELDATE - HEADER_DATES
 LINE*
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : DELDATE - DELDATE
 LINE*
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : CONSGNEE - HEADER_DELADDRESS
 LINE*
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - HEADER_TEXT
 LINEASHeader texts, defined in the IMG under <LS>Messages -> Texts for
 LINE  messages -> Define texts for <purchasing document> -> Texts for document
 LINE  header</>.
 LINEASThe variable TTXIT-TDTEXT contains the name of the text (e.g.
 LINE  "subsidiary arrangements". It is only filled if the <LS>Print text name
 LINE= </> indicator is set at the above point in the IMG.
 LINEASThe other variables of this text element are:
 LINEAST166K-TDOBJECT:,,Text object (e.g. EKKO for document header texts)
 LINE/ T166K-TDID:,,,,Text ID (e.g. F01 for PO header text)
 LINE/ T166K-TXNAM:,,Name of text (in case of document texts, no. of document;
 LINE/ ,,,,,,,,in case of standard texts, name of standard text)
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - HEADER_INFO_ACKNOW
 LINEASIs outputted if
 LINEB1the <LS>order acknowledgment</> indicator is set in all items,
 LINEB1an order acknowledgment number has not been entered for all items, and
 LINEB1a printout of the order acknowledgment expediter is not involved.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - TERMS
 LINEASContains the terms of delivery (Incoterms) and the first line of the
 LINE  terms of payment.
 LINEASThe fields EKKO-INCO1 and EKKO-INCO2 are only filled if the terms of
 LINE  delivery are identical in all items. Otherwise the Incoterms are printed
 LINE  at item level.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - TERMS_OF_PAYMENT
 LINEASAdditional lines for terms of payment.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - HEADER_TARGET_VALUE
 LINEASTarget value of an outline agreement or an RFQ. Outputted only if a
 LINE  target value has been entered in the document. Not outputted in the case
 LINE  of delivery schedules issued under scheduling agreements.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - REASON_FOR_REJECTION
 LINE*
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - CHANGE_REMARKS
 LINEASContains notes indicating which data of the document has been changed.
 LINE  Applies only to the printout of changes (change notice).
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_HEADER_F
 LINEASHeading for list of document items in the case of a purchase order.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_DATE
 LINEASDelivery date per item in the purchase order. Applies only to the
 LINE  purchase order.
 LINEASIf you specify the delivery date in the form of a calendar week or month
 LINE= , the following variables contain the following texts:
 LINEASRM06P-PRITX:,,Text "week" or "month"
 LINE/ RM06P-LFDAT:,,Delivery date
 LINE/ RM06P-PHTXT:,,In the case of reminders/expediters, a text noting the
 LINE/ ,,,,,,,,ordinal number of the current document
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_WEMNG
 LINEASIn the case of reminder/expediters, contains information indicating how
 LINE  much of the relevant item is still to be delivered.
 LINEASThe variable RM06P-PRMG2 contains the quantity in print format; the
 LINE  variable T006A-MSEHT the text for the unit of measurement.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_LINE_2F
 LINEASThe second item line in the case of PO items if no price is outputted
 LINE  (i.e. price = 0 or price printout indicator not set) or there is a
 LINE  variant order price unit.
 LINEASThe variable RM06P-PRMG1 contains the order quantity in print format;
 LINE  the variable T006A-MSEHT the name of the order unit.
 LINEASIn the case of printouts of order acknowledgment expediters, the already
 LINE  acknowledged quantity is also outputted in the field RM06P-PRMG2 if this
 LINE  is larger than 0 but smaller than the quantity ordered.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_LINE_3F
 LINEASThe second item line in the case of PO items for which a price is
 LINE  outputted but not in this line (e.g. if the price is arrived at via
 LINE  several condition types).
 LINEASRM06P-PRMG1 contains the quantity in the order price unit; T006A-MSEHT
 LINE  the name of the order price unit.
 LINEASFor RM06P-PRMG2: see text element ITEM_LINE_2F.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_LINE_3F_PRICE
 LINEASThe second item line in the case of PO items for which the price is also
 LINE  outputted in this line.
 LINEASThe variables that are not already included in ITEM_LINE_3F are as
 LINE  follows:
 LINEASEKPO-NETPR:,,,,Net price of item (i.e. for 1 unit)
 LINE/ RM06P-PRPEI:,,Price unit
 LINE/ EKPO-NETWR:,,,,Total net value of item
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_HEADER_A
 LINEASHeading for list of document items in the case of an RFQ.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_LINE_A
 LINEASItem line in the case of an RFQ.
 LINEASThe individual variables are as follows:
 LINEASEKPO-EBELP:,,,,Item number
 LINE/ EKPO-EMATN:,,,,Material number
 LINE/ EKPO-TXZ01:,,,,Short text for material
 LINE/ RM06P-PRMG1:,,RFQ quantity in print format
 LINE/ T006A-MSEHT:,,Name of unit of measure
 LINE/ EKPO-AGDAT:,,,,Deadline for submission of quotations
 LINE/ RM06P-PRITX:,,Text "week" or "month" in case of dates expressed as
 LINE/ ,,,,,,,,calendar weeks or months
 LINE/ RM06P-LFDAT:,,Delivery date specified in RFQ
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_HEADER_R
 LINEASHeading for list of document items in the case of an outline agreement.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_LINE_2R
 LINEASThe second item line in the case of agreement items if no price is
 LINE  outputted (i.e. price 0 or price printout indicator not set) or variant
 LINE  order price unit exists.
 LINEASThe variable RM06P-PRMG1 contains the target quantity of the agreement
 LINE  in print format; T006A-MSEHT the name of the order unit.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_LINE_3R
 LINEASThe second item line in the case of outline agreement items for which a
 LINE  price is outputted.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_1
 LINEASIn the case of printouts of delivery schedules for scheduling agreements
 LINE= , general information on the scheduling agreement item (material number, quantity delivered etc.) is printed here (before the list
 LINE  of schedule lines).
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_FZ
 LINEASOnly in the case of printouts of delivery schedules for scheduling
 LINE  agreements.
 LINEASData on the last goods receipt (quantity delivered, delivery date,
 LINE  delivery note number).
 LINEASThis text element is only invoked if the display of cumulative
 LINE  quantities is active. You can achieve this by assigning the entry
 LINE  routine ENTRY_LPFZ, or a customer-defined one in which the variable XFZ
 LINE  is set to 'X', when assigning the program, routine, and layout set to
 LINE  the message type (in the standard system, this is the message LPFZ).
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_ABRFZ
 LINEASOnly in printouts of delivery schedules (for scheduling agreements) with
 LINE  release documentation.
 LINEASData on the last goods receipt.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_REC
 LINEASOnly in printouts of scheduling agreement delivery schedules, and only
 LINE  if the display of cumulative quantities is active (see ITEM_INFO_FZ):
 LINEASOutput of agreed cumulative quantity with reconciliation date.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_ZONE1
 LINEASOnly in printouts of scheduling agreement delivery schedules:
 LINEASOutput of end date of firm zone (go-ahead for production).
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_ZONE2
 LINEASOnly in printouts of scheduling agreement delivery schedules:
 LINEASOutput of end date of trade-off zone (go-ahead for purchase of input
 LINE  materials)
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_VKP
 LINE*
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_LINE_1
 LINEASFirst item line in the case of purchase orders and outline agreements.
 LINEASThe variables are as follows:
 LINEASEKPO-EBELP:,,Item number
 LINE/ EKPO-EMATN:,,Material number
 LINE/ EKPO-TXZ01:,,Short text of material
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_2
 LINEASOutput of additional information on item (after the actual item lines).
 LINE  Applies to all document categories.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_ACKNOW
 LINEASIs outputted if the indicator <LS>order acknowledgment requirement</>
 LINE  has been set for individual items
 LINEASNot outputted if
 LINEB1the item already contains an order acknowledgment number
 LINEB1an acknowledgment expediter is involved
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_QM_1
 LINEASOutput of required certificate category per delivery.
 LINEASIs invoked if
 LINEB1the certificate category is set in the document item and
 LINEB1the QM control key for the item includes a certificate requirement
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_QM_2
 LINEASOutput of required certificate category for item.
 LINEASIs invoked if
 LINEB1the certificate category is set in the document item and
 LINEB1the QM control key for the item includes a certificate requirement
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - QM_TEXT
 LINEASOutput of "quality assurance agreement" and "technical delivery terms"
 LINE  from QM (if they exist).
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_TEXT
 LINEASItem texts, defined in the IMG under <LS>Messages -> Texts for messages
 LINE  -> Define texts for <purchasing document> -> Texts for document item</>.
 LINEASThe variable TTXIT-TDTEXT contains the name of the text (e.g. "material
 LINE  master purchase order text"). Only filled if the <LS>Print name</>
 LINE  indicator is set at the above point in the IMG.
 LINEASThe other variables of this text element are:
 LINEAST166P-TDOBJECT:,,Text object (e.g. EKPO for item texts)
 LINE/ T166P-TDID:,,,,Text ID (e.g. F01 for PO item text)
 LINE/ T166P-TXNAM:,,Name of text (in case of document texts, no. of document;
 LINE/ ,,,,,,,,in the case of standard texts, name of standard text)
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_DELADDRESS
 LINEASThe delivery address (if printed at item level).
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_RECIEVER
 LINE*
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_RECIEVER_WQ
 LINE*
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_RECIEVER_WP
 LINE*
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_CONDITIONS
 LINEASOnly in the case of POs and scheduling agreements with time-independent
 LINE  conditions.
 LINEASOutput of condition types without price unit (percentage conditions):
 LINEASKOMVD-VTEXT:,,Name of condition
 LINE/ KOMVD-KBETR:,,Amount of condition
 LINE/ KOMVD-KOEIN:,,Unit of output (currency, unit of measure or '%')
 LINE/ KOMVD-KWERT:,,Total value of condition
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_CONDITIONS_UNIT
 LINEASOnly in the case of POs and scheduling agreements with time-dependent
 LINE  conditions.
 LINEASOutput of condition types with price unit (quantity-, weight-dependent
 LINE  conditions etc.).
 LINEASThis text element has the following variables in addition to those of
 LINE  ITEM_CONDITIONS:
 LINEASKOMVD-KPEIN:,,Price unit of condition (e.g. per 100 pcs.)
 LINE/ KOMVD-KMEIN:,,Unit of measure of condition (pc. in above example).
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS
 LINEASOnly in the case of contracts and scheduling agreements with
 LINE  time-dependent conditions.
 LINEASOutput of condition types without price unit (percentage conditions):
 LINEASEKOMD-VTEXT:,,Name of condition
 LINE/ EKOMD-KBETR:,,Amount of condition
 LINE/ EKOMD-KOEIN:,,Unit of output (currency, unit of measure or '%')
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_UNIT
 LINEASOnly in the case of contracts and scheduling agreements with
 LINE  time-dependent conditions.
 LINEASOutput of condition types with price unit (quantity-, weight-dependent
 LINE  conditions etc.)
 LINEASThis text element contains the following variables in addition to those
 LINE  in ITEM_MCONDITIONS:
 LINEASEKOMD-KPEIN:,,Price unit of condition
 LINE/ EKOMD-KMEIN:,,Unit of measure of condition
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_PLANT
 LINEASOnly in the case of centrally agreed contracts.
 LINEASIntermediate line, after which the conditions that apply specifically to
 LINE  the plant EKOMD-WERKS are listed.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_VALID
 LINEASOutput of validity period of conditions.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_SCALE_FROM
 LINEASIn the case of conditions with "From" scales: name of condition.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_SCALE_TO
 LINEASIn the case of conditions with "To" scales: name of condition.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_SCALE_FROM_I
 LINEASIn the case of conditions with accelerated "From" scales: name of
 LINE  condition.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_SCALE_TO_I
 LINEASIn the case of conditions with accelerated "To" scales: name of
 LINE  condition.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_QUANT_SCALE
 LINEASLine for scale level in case of quantity, weight and volume scales
 LINE  without price unit (percentage conditions).
 LINEASThe variables are as follows:
 LINEASEKOMD-KSTBM:,,Scale basis quantity
 LINE/ EKOMD-KONMS:,,Unit of measure
 LINE/ EKOMD-KBETR:,,Condition amount
 LINE/ EKOMD-KOEIN:,,Unit of output (currency, unit of measure, or '%')
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_QUANT_SCALE_U
 LINEASLine for scale level in case of quantity, weight, and volume scales with
 LINE  price unit.
 LINEASThis text element has the following variables in addition to those in
 LINE  ITEM_MCONDITIONS_QUANT_SCALE:
 LINEASEKOMD-KPEIN:,,Condition price unit
 LINE/ EKOMD-KMEIN:,,Condition unit of measure
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_VALUE_SCALE
 LINEASLine for scale level in case of value scales w/o price unit (percentage
 LINE  conditions).
 LINEASThe variables are as follows:
 LINEASEKOMD-KSTBW:,,Scale basis value
 LINE/ EKOMD-KONWS:,,Currency key of condition
 LINE/ EKOMD-KBETR:,,Condition amount
 LINE/ EKOMD-KOEIN:,,Unit of output (currency, unit of measure or '%')
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_VALUE_SCALE_U
 LINEASLine for scale level in case of value scales with price unit
 LINEASVariables: see ITEM_MCONDITIONS_VALUE_SCALE and
 LINE  ITEM_MCONDITIONS_QUANT_SCALE_UNIT
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - HEAD_MCONDITIONS
 LINEASHeading above header conditions.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_SCHEDULE_HEADER_NEW
 LINEASHeading above the schedule lines in a PO or RFQ item (in the PO, only in
 LINE  new - i.e. original - printouts).
 LINEASThe variable RM06P-PHTXT contains the string 'time' in case the time has
 LINE  to be specified in at lease one schedule line.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_SCHEDULE_HEADER
 LINEASHeading above schedule lines in the case of PO change notices.
 LINEASThe variable RM06P-PHTXT contains the string 'time' in case the time has
 LINE  to be specified in at lease one schedule line.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_SCHEDULE
 LINEASSchedule line in PO/RFQ where the delivery date is specified as a
 LINE  calendar week or month.
 LINEASThe variables are as follows:
 LINEASRM06P-PRMG1:,,Scheduled quantity
 LINE/ T006A-MSEHT:,,Name of order unit
 LINE/ RM06P-PRITX:,,Text "week" or "month"
 LINE/ RM06P-LFDAT:,,Delivery date
 LINE/ RM06P-PHTXT:,,Text noting the ordinal number of the current expediter
 LINE/ ,,,,,,,,(only in the case of expediter printout)
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_SCHEDULE_DAY
 LINEASSchedule line in PO/RFQ in case of schedules based on calendar days.
 LINEASVariables: see ITEM_SCHEDULE
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_SCHEDULE_HEADER_L1
 LINEASHeading above schedule lines when scheduling agreement delivery
 LINE  schedules are printed under the following preconditions:
 LINEB1No printout of reminders/expediters
 LINEB1No display of cumulative quantities
 LINEB1No printout of open GR quantities
 LINEASThe variable RM06P-PHTXT contains the string 'time' in case the time has
 LINE  to be specified in at least one schedule line.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_SCHEDULE_HEADER_L2
 LINEASHeading above schedule lines when scheduling agreement delivery
 LINE  schedules are printed under the following preconditions:
 LINEB1Printout of reminders/expediters
 LINEB1No display of cumulative quantities
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_SCHEDULE_HEADER_L3
 LINEASHeading above schedule lines when scheduling agreement delivery
 LINE  schedules are printed under the following preconditions:
 LINEB1No printout of reminders/expediters
 LINEB1No display of cumulative quantities
 LINEB1Printout of open GR quantities
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_SCHEDULE_HEADER_L4
 LINEASHeading above schedule lines when scheduling agreement delivery
 LINE  schedules are printed under the following preconditions:
 LINEB1No printout of reminders/expediters
 LINEB1Display of cumulative quantities
 LINEB1No printout of open GR quantities
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_SCHEDULE_HEADER_L5
 LINEASHeading above schedule lines when scheduling agreement delivery
 LINE  schedules are printed under the following preconditions:
 LINEB1No printout of reminders/expediters
 LINEB1Display of cumulative quantities
 LINEB1Printout of open GR quantities
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_SCHEDULE_HEADER_L6
 LINEASHeading above schedule lines when scheduling agreement delivery
 LINE  schedules are printed under the following preconditions:
 LINEB1Printout of reminders/expediters
 LINEB1Display of cumulative quantities

 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_SATNR_COND
 LINE*
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_CONF_OUT
 LINE*
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - COMP_HEADER_1
 LINEASHeading above the list of components provided to subcontractor (in case
 LINE  of PO or scheduling agreement items of the category "subcontracting")
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - COMP_HEADER_2
 LINEASHeading above the list of components provided to subcontractor for a PO
 LINE  or schedule line (in case of PO or scheduling agreement items of the
 LINE  category "subcontracting")
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - COMP_LINE
 LINEASLine with components provided.
 LINEASThe variables are as follows:
 LINEASMDPM-MAKTX:,,,,Short text for components
 LINE/ RM06P-PRMG1:,,Quantity provided
 LINE/ T006A-MSEHT:,,Name of unit of measure
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MPN_LISTHEADER
 LINE*
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MPN_LISTLINE
 LINE*
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_DVS_HEADER
 LINE*
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_DVS_DOCUMENT
 LINE*
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_ADDI_EXTRA_TEXT
 LINE*
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - SRV_CHANGE
 LINE*
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - SRV
 LINE* This text element comprises all elements that belong to External
 LINE  Services Management. An exception are those text elements that output
 LINE  conditions. The text elements from Purchasing are used to output
 LINE  conditions. In the case of document conditions, these start with
 LINE  ITEM_CONDITION... . In the case of master conditions, they begin with
 LINE  ITEM_MCONDITION... .
 LINE* All FORM routines that are specifically required to print services are
 LINE  located in program FM06PF04. The view that principally supplies the text
 LINE  elements is ML_ESLL. You can use all the fields defined there in the
 LINE  text elements.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ZIELWERT
 LINE* The expected value of unplanned services is outputted here. All fields
 LINE  of table ESUH are available. Appears only if the value is not zero and
 LINE  the price printout indicator has been set.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - CZIELWERT
 LINE*
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - SERVICES
 LINE* Most important element, since the data of a service line is outputted
 LINE  here. The outline lines are also printed in accordance with the existing
 LINE  hierarchy (if such lines exist). The services are assigned to their
 LINE  outline levels.
 LINE* The fields from ML_ESLL are available here. Central routines supplying
 LINE  the text element with data are PRINT_GLIEDERUNG and PRINT_SRVPOS.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - SRV_ABRUF
 LINE* The release order data for a PO relating to services is outputted here.
 LINE  The auxiliary structure RM11P is used for this purpose. However, only
 LINE  the fields rm11p-pln_extrow and rm11p-pln_grp are filled. The routine
 LINE  supplying the text element is called PRINT_ABRUFDATEN.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - TIME_DATA
 LINE* The time data that can be entered when maintaining external services is
 LINE  outputted here. The routine supplying the text element with data is
 LINE  called PRINT_TIME.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - FORMEL_KOPF
 LINE* The formula data used in the service line is outputted here. The routine
 LINE  supplying the text element with data is called print_formel.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - FORMEL_BODY
 LINE* The data of the individual variables belonging to the formula that is
 LINE  used is outputted here. The routine supplying the text element with data
 LINE  is called print_formel.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - DEL_SERVICE
 LINE*
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - DEL_GLIEDR
 LINE*
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - CHANGE_SERVICE
 LINE*
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INV_SCHED_PERIODIC
 LINE* The start and end dates and the rule text for the periodic invoicing
 LINE  plan for a PO item are outputted here. The routines supplying the text
 LINE  element with data are located in program FM06PF05.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INV_SCHED_PERCENT_HEADER
 LINE* The relevant percentage and date description for the first line of the
 LINE  percentage partial invoicing plan for a PO item are outputted here. The
 LINE  routines supplying the text element with data are located in program
 LINE  FM06PF05.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INV_SCHED_PERCENT
 LINE* The relevant percentages and date descriptions for all subsequent lines
 LINE  of the percentage partial invoicing plan for a PO item are outputted
 LINE  here. The routines supplying the text element with data are located in
 LINE  program FM06PF05.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INV_SCHED_VALUE_HEADER
 LINE* The relevant partial amount, the currency, and the date description for
 LINE  the first line of the partial invoicing plan with distribution on a
 LINE  value basis for a PO item are outputted here. The routines supplying the
 LINE  text element with data are located in program FM06PF05.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INV_SCHED_VALUE
 LINE* The relevant partial amounts, the currency, and the date descriptions
 LINE  for all subsequent lines of the partial invoicing plan with distribution
 LINE  on a value basis for a PO item are outputted here. The routines
 LINE  supplying the text element with data are located in program FM06PF05.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - MAINTANCE_SCHED_HEADER
 LINE* The data of the preventive maintenance (servicing) plan assigned to the
 LINE  PO item is outputted here (plan number and details of servicing/
 LINE  maintenance cycle). The routine supplying the text element with data is
 LINE  called PRINT_MAINTANCE_SCHEDULE.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - MAINTANCE_SCHED_POS
 LINE* The data of the assigned preventive maintenance (servicing) plan is
 LINE  outputted here. The routine supplying the text element with data is
 LINE  called PRINT_MAINTANCE_SCHEDULE.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - SRV_WS
 LINE* The relevant data from the preventive maintenance (servicing) plan
 LINE  assigned to the PO item is outputted here (along the lines of text
 LINE  element MAIN - SRV).
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - SERVICES_WS
 LINE* The relevant data from the preventive maintenance (servicing) plan
 LINE  assigned to the PO item is outputted here (along the lines of text
 LINE  element MAIN - SERVICES).
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - TIME_DATA_WS
 LINE* The relevant data from the preventive maintenance (servicing) plan
 LINE  assigned to the PO item is outputted here (along the lines of text
 LINE  element MAIN - TIME_DATA).
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - FORMEL_KOPF_WS
 LINE* The relevant data from the preventive maintenance (servicing) plan
 LINE  assigned to the PO item is outputted here (along the lines of text
 LINE  element MAIN - FORMEL_KOPF).
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - FORMEL_BODY_WS
 LINE* The relevant data from the preventive maintenance (servicing) plan
 LINE  assigned to the PO item is outputted here (along the lines of text
 LINE  element MAIN - FORMEL_BODY).
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - TOTAL_AMOUNT_ITEMS
 LINEASNet value of all items.
 LINEASThe variables are as follows:
 LINEASEKKO-WAERS:,,Document currency
 LINE/ KOMK-SUPOS:,,Total net value
 LINEASThe element is only invoked if the price printout indicator has been set
 LINE  in all items.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - TOTAL_AMOUNT
 LINEASTotal net value of document (incl. header conditions).
 LINEASThe variables are as follows:
 LINEASEKKO-WAERS:,,Document currency
 LINE/ KOMK-FKWRT:,,Total net value
 LINEASThe element is only invoked if the price printout indicator has been set
 LINE  in all items.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - SUPPL_TEXT
 LINEASSupplement texts defined in the IMG under <LS>Message determination ->
 LINE  Texts for messages -> Define texts for <purchasing document> -> Texts
 LINE  for document header</>.
 LINEASThe variable TTXIT-TDTEXT contains the name of the text. It is only
 LINE  filled if the <LS>Print name</> indicator has been set at the above
 LINE  point in the IMG.
 LINEASThe other variables of this text element are:
 LINEAST166A-TDOBJECT:,,Text object (e.g. EKKO for document supplement texts)
 LINE/ T166A-TDID:,,,,Text ID (e.g. F12 for asset)
 LINE/ T166A-TXNAM:,,Name of text (in case of document texts, no. of document;
 LINE/ ,,,,,,,,in case of standard texts, name of standard text)
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - LAST
 LINEASThe text containing the complimentary close is integrated here as an
 LINE  INCLUDE. You assign the text in the IMG under the step <LS>Message
 LINE  determination -> Texts for messages -> Define texts for purchasing
 LINE  organization</>. On the detail screen, you make the assignment in the
 LINE  <LS>Text for complimentary close</> field.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - PROTECT
 LINE*
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ENDPROTECT
 LINE*
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - MS_SERVICE_HEADER_CONDITIONS
 LINE*
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - MS_TOTAL_AMOUNT_ITEM
 LINE*
 LINE>5U1*ELEMENT : NEXTPAGE - NEXTPAGE
 LINE*
 LINE>6U1*ELEMENT : TERMS - TERMS
 LINE*
 LINE>5U1*ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_ADDI_INFO
 LINE*
 END

 LINE/:IF &PAGE& EQ 1.
 LINE/:INCLUDE &T024E-TXADR& OBJECT TEXT ID ADRS LANGUAGE &EKKO-SPRAS&
 LINE*
 LINE/:ENDIF.
 LINE/:IF &EKKO-ADRNR(K)& EQ '          '
 LINE/:ADDRESS PARAGRAPH AS
 LINE/:  TITLE    &LFA1-ANRED&
 LINE/:  NAME     &LFA1-NAME1&, &LFA1-NAME2&, &LFA1-NAME3&, &LFA1-NAME4&
 LINE/:  STREET   &LFA1-STRAS&
 LINE/:  POBOX    &LFA1-PFACH&  CODE &LFA1-PSTL2&
 LINE/:  CITY     &LFA1-ORT01&, &LFA1-ORT02&
 LINE/:  POSTCODE &LFA1-PSTLZ&
 LINE/:  COUNTRY  &LFA1-LAND1&
 LINE/:  REGION   &LFA1-REGIO&
 LINE/:  FROMCOUNTRY &T001-LAND1&
 LINE/:ENDADDRESS
 LINE/:ELSE
 LINE/:ADDRESS PARAGRAPH AS
 LINE/:  ADDRESSNUMBER &EKKO-ADRNR(K)&
 LINE/:  FROMCOUNTRY &T001-LAND1&
 LINE/:ENDADDRESS
 LINE/:ENDIF

 LINE/EHEADER_DELADDRESS
 LINEASLivraison destine  :

 LINE/:  NAME     &SADR-NAME1&, &SADR-NAME2&, &SADR-NAME3&, &SADR-NAME4&

 LINE/:  CITY     &SADR-ORT01&, &SADR-ORT02&

 LINE/:  COUNTRY  &SADR-LAND1&
 LINE/:  REGION   &SADR-REGIO&
 LINE/:  FROMCOUNTRY &LFA1-LAND1&
 LINE/:ENDADDRESS
 LINE/:ELSE
 LINE/:IF &PEKKO-ADRNR(K)& NE '          '
 LINE/:ADDRESS DELIVERY PARAGRAPH AS
 LINE/:  ADDRESSNUMBER &PEKKO-ADRNR(K)&
 LINE/:  FROMCOUNTRY &LFA1-LAND1&
 LINE/:ENDADDRESS
 LINE/:ELSE

 LINE/:  FROMCOUNTRY &LFA1-LAND1&

 LINE/:ENDIF

 LINEZL,,&'de 'ML_ESLL-BEGTIME&' '&'  'ML_ESLL-ENDTIME' hre'&
 LINE/:ENDIF

 LINE>0U1FORM : YCH02_04_MEDRUCK
 LINEASCommandes d'achat
 LINE>1U1PAGE : FIRST
 LINEASPremire page
 LINE>2U1PAGE : NEXT
 LINEASPage suivante
 LINE>3U1WINDOW : ADDRESS
 LINEASIl s'agit de la fentre d'adresse du document qui comprend
 LINE  essentiellement l'adresse du fournisseur.
 LINEASL'adresse de l'organisation d'achats est dite sur la premire page,
 LINE  au-dessus de l'adresse du fournisseur. Cette adresse est mmorise dans
 LINE  le texte standard T024E-TXADR que vous affectez dans l'IMG, tape
 LINE  <LS>Dtermination des messages -> Textes des messages -> Textes de
 LINE  l'organisation d'achats</>, et ce, dans la zone <LS>Texte adresse</> de
 LINE  l'cran de dtail.
 LINEASAttention : la fentre des pages suivantes (page NEXT) ne comprend que
 LINE  trois lignes. Vous allez donc peut-tre devoir supprimer certaines
 LINE  lignes de l'adresse fournisseur.
 LINE>4U1WINDOW : CONSGNEE
 LINEASAdresse d'expdition
 LINE>3U1WINDOW : DELDATE
 LINEASDates
 LINE>4U1WINDOW : FOOTER
 LINEASBas de page
 LINE>3U1WINDOW : HEADER
 LINEASEn-tte/Logo
 LINE>4U1WINDOW : INFO
 LINEASInformations gnrales -  droite
 LINE>3U1WINDOW : INFO1
 LINEASInformations gnrales -  gauche
 LINE>4U1WINDOW : INFO2
 LINEASInformations gnrales -  droite
 LINE>3U1WINDOW : MAIN
 LINEASFentre principale
 LINE>4U1WINDOW : PAGE
 LINEASNumro de page
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : DELDATE - HEADER_DATES
 LINE*
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : DELDATE - DELDATE
 LINE*
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : CONSGNEE - HEADER_DELADDRESS
 LINE*
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - HEADER_TEXT
 LINEASIl s'agit des textes d'en-tte dfinis dans l'IMG sous <LS>Messages ->
 LINE  Textes des messages -> Dterminer textes de <Document d'achat -> Textes
 LINE  de l'en-tte du document</>.
 LINEASLa variable TTXIT-TDTEXT correspond  la dsignation du texte (ex. :
 LINE  "titre supplmentaire"). Elle n'est renseigne que si le code
 LINE  <LS>Imprimer dsignation</> est activ dans l'IMG.
 LINEASAutres variables de cet lment de texte :
 LINEAST166K-TDOBJECT:,,Objet du texte (ex. : EKKO des textes de l'en-tte)
 LINE/ T166K-TDID:,,,,ID texte (ex. : F01 pour le texte d'en-tte de commande)
 LINE/ T166K-TXNAM:,,Nom du texte (dans les textes des documents, numro de ce
 LINE/ ,,,,,,,,document ; dans les textes standard, nom du texte standard).
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - HEADER_INFO_ACKNOW
 LINEASCet lment est dit
 LINEB1si le code <LS>Confirmation de commande d'achat</> est activ dans tous
 LINE  les postes
 LINEB1si un numro de confirmation n'a pas t saisi dans tous les postes et
 LINEB1s'il ne s'agit pas de l'impression de la relance de confirmation.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - TERMS
 LINEASCet lment regroupe les conditions de livraison (Incoterms) et la
 LINE  premire ligne des conditions de paiement.
 LINEASLes zones EKKO-INCO1 et EKKO-INCO2 ne sont renseignes que si les
 LINE  conditions de livraison sont identiques dans tous les postes. Si tel
 LINE  n'est pas le cas, les Incoterms seront imprims au niveau du poste.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - TERMS_OF_PAYMENT
 LINEASAutres lignes des conditions de paiement
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - HEADER_TARGET_VALUE
 LINEASIl s'agit de la valeur cible d'un contrat cadre ou d'une demande
 LINE  d'offre. Cette valeur ne sera dite que si vous avez saisi une valeur
 LINE  cible dans le document. Elle ne sera pas dite s'il s'agit d'chances
 LINE  du programme de livraisons.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - REASON_FOR_REJECTION
 LINE*
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - CHANGE_REMARKS
 LINEASCet lment regroupe des notes sur les donnes modifies du document et
 LINE  ne concerne que l'impression des modifications.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_HEADER_F
 LINEASIntitul de la liste des postes d'une commande d'achat
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_DATE
 LINEASDate de livraison par poste de la commande. Cette date ne concerne que
 LINE  la commande.
 LINEASSi vous utilisez des semaines ou des mois comme date de livraison, les
 LINE  variables correspondent aux lments suivants :
 LINEASRM06P-PRITX:,,texte "Semaine" ou "Mois"
 LINE/ RM06P-LFDAT:,,date de livraison
 LINE/ RM06P-PHTXT:,,s'il s'agit d'une impression de la relance, notice
 LINE/ ,,,,,,,,rappelant le numro de la relance
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_WEMNG
 LINEASDans le cadre de l'impression des relances, ces donnes vous signalent
 LINE  le nombre de postes restant  livrer.
 LINEASLa variable RM06P-PRMG2 correspond  la quantit mise en forme pour
 LINE  impression, et la T006A-MSEHT  la dsignation de l'unit de mesure.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_LINE_2F
 LINEASIl s'agit de la deuxime ligne des postes de commandes d'achat si aucun
 LINE  prix n'est dit (le prix 0 ou le code d'impression du prix n'est donc
 LINE  pas activ) ou s'il existe une autre unit de prix.
 LINEASLa variable RM06P-PRMG1 correspond  la quantit de commande mise en
 LINE  forme pour impression, la variable T006A-MSEHT  la dsignation de
 LINE  l'unit d'achat.
 LINEASSi vous imprimez des relances de confirmations de commandes, la quantit
 LINE  dj confirme sera dite dans la zone RM06P-PRMG2 si elle est
 LINE  suprieure  0 mais infrieure  la quantit commande.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_LINE_3F
 LINEASIl s'agit de la deuxime ligne des postes de commandes. Un prix sera
 LINE  dit pour ces postes, mais pas dans cette ligne (ex. : si le prix se
 LINE  compose de plusieurs types de conditions)
 LINEASLa zone RM06P-PRMG1 comprend la quantit, exprime en unit de prix et
 LINE  la zone T006A-MSEHT, la dsignation de l'unit de prix.
 LINEASConsultez l'lment ITEM_LINE_2F pour RM06P-PRMG2.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_LINE_3F_PRICE
 LINEASIl s'agit de la deuxime ligne du poste de commande. Le prix sera
 LINE  galement dit dans cette ligne.
 LINEASSignification des variables de ITEM_LINE_3F :
 LINEASEKPO-NETPR:,,,,Prix net du poste (pour 1 unit)
 LINE/ RM06P-PRPEI:,,Base du prix
 LINE/ EKPO-NETWR:,,,,Valeur nette totale du poste
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_HEADER_A
 LINEASIntitul de la liste des postes d'une demande d'offre
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_LINE_A

 LINEASEKPO-EBELP:,,,,Numro de poste
 LINE/ EKPO-EMATN:,,,,Numro d'article
 LINE/ EKPO-TXZ01:,,,,Dsignation de l'article
 LINE/ RM06P-PRMG1:,,Quantit demande mise en forme pour impression
 LINE/ T006A-MSEHT:,,Dsignation de l'unit de quantit
 LINE/ EKPO-AGDAT:,,,,Dlai de soumission de l'offre
 LINE/ RM06P-PRITX:,,Texte "Semaine" ou "Mois" si la date est exprime sous
 LINE/ ,,,,,,,,forme de jour ou de mois
 LINE/ RM06P-LFDAT:,,Date de livraison demande

 LINE  contrat-cadre.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_LINE_2R
 LINEASIl s'agit de la deuxime ligne des postes de contrats si aucun prix
 LINE  n'est dit (le prix 0 ou le code d'impression du prix n'est donc pas
 LINE  activ) ou s'il existe une autre unit de prix.
 LINEASLa variable RM06P-PRMG1 correspond  la quantit cible du contrat mise
 LINE  en forme pour impression, la variable T006A-MSEHT  la dsignation de
 LINE  l'unit d'achat.

 LINEASIl s'agit de la deuxime ligne des postes de contrats-cadres dans

 LINE  livre, etc.)
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_FZ
 LINEASUniquement lors de l'impression des chances du programme de livraisons
 LINE  :
 LINEASDonnes de la dernire entre de marchandises (quantit livre, date de
 LINE  livraison, numro du bon de livraison).
 LINEASCet lment n'est appel que si l'affichage de la quantit cumule est
 LINE  actif. Pour ce faire, vous devez affecter la routine de lancement
 LINE  ENTRY_LPFZ lors de l'affectation du programme, de la routine et de la
 LINE  catgorie de message (il s'agit du message LPFZ dans la version
 LINE  standard). Vous pouvez galement affecter une routine client dans
 LINE  laquelle le code X est activ pour la variable XFZ.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_ABRFZ
 LINEASUniquement lors de l'impression des chances du programme de livraisons
 LINE  :
 LINEASDonnes de la dernire entre de marchandises

 LINE  et uniquement si l'affichage des quantits cumules est actif (cf.
 LINE  ITEM_INFO_FZ) :
 LINEASEdition de la quantit cumule convenue avec date de rapprochement

 LINE  lancement de la production)

 LINE  de postes en soi). Cette remarque s'applique  toutes les catgories de
 LINEASdocuments.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_ACKNOW
 LINEASEst dit si le code <LS>Gestion obligatoire des confirmations de
 LINE  commande</> est activ dans les diffrents postes.
 LINEASN'est pas dit
 LINEB1si un numro de confirmation de commande est dj dfini dans ce poste
 LINEB1s'il s'agit d'une relance de confirmation

 LINEB1la gestion obligatoire des certificats est prvue pour la cl de
 LINE  pilotage QM de ce poste

 LINEB1le type de certificat est dfini dans le poste du document et
 LINEB1la gestion obligatoire des certificats est prvue pour la cl de
 LINE  pilotage QM de ce poste
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - QM_TEXT

 LINE  livraisons techniques" dfinis dans QM (s'ils existent)
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_TEXT
 LINEASTextes de postes configurs sous <LS>Messages -> Textes des messages ->
 LINE  Dfinir textes du <Document d'achat> -> Textes du poste de document</>.
 LINEASLa variable TTXIT-TDTEXT correspond  la dsignation du texte (ex :
 LINE  "Texte de commande des articles"). Elle n'est renseigne que si le code
 LINE  <LS>Imprimer dsignation</> est activ dans l'IMG.
 LINEASAutres variables de cet lment de texte :
 LINEAST166P-TDOBJECT :,,Objet de texte (ex. : EKPO pour textes de postes)
 LINE/ T166P-TDID :,,,,ID de texte (ex. : F01 pour le texte du poste de
 LINE/ commande)
 LINE/ T166P-TXNAM :,,le nom du texte (pour les textes de documents, le numro
 LINE/ ,,,,,,,,du document, pour les textes standard, le nom du texte standard)
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_DELADDRESS
 LINEASIl s'agit de l'adresse de livraison si cette dernire est imprime au
 LINE  niveau du poste.

 LINE*

 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_CONDITIONS
 LINEASUniquement pour des commandes et des programmes de livraisons avec
 LINEASconditions sans priodes de validit.

 LINE/ :

 LINE/ KOMVD-KBETR:,,Montant de la condition
 LINEASKOMVD-KOEIN:,,Unit d'dition (devise, unit de quantit ou '%')

 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_CONDITIONS_UNIT
 LINEASUniquement s'il s'agit de commandes et des programmes de livraisons sans
 LINE  priodes de validit.
 LINEASEdition des types de conditions avec base de prix (conditions
 LINE  spcifiques  la quantit, au poids, etc.).
 LINEASEn plus de ITEM_CONDITIONS :
 LINE/ KOMVD-KPEIN :,,Base de prix de la condition (ex. : pour 100 pices)
 LINE/ KOMVD-KMEIN :,,Unit de quantit de la condition (pice dans l'exemple
 LINE  ci-dessus).
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS
 LINEASUniquement s'il s'agit de contrats et de programmes de livraisons dont
 LINE  les conditions sont affectes d'une priode de validit.
 LINEASEdition de types de conditions sans base de prix (conditions relatives)
 LINE/ :
 LINE/ EKOMD-VTEXT:,,Dsignation de la condition
 LINEASEKOMD-KBETR:,,Montant de la condition
 LINEASEKOMD-KOEIN:,,Unit d'dition (devise, unit de quantit ou %)
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_UNIT
 LINEASUniquement s'il s'agit de contrats et de programmes de livraisons dont
 LINE  les conditions sont affectes d'une priode de validit.
 LINEASEdition de types de conditions avec base de prix (conditions spcifiques
 LINE   la quantit ou au poids, etc.)
 LINEASVariables diffrentes de ITEM_MCONDITIONS :
 LINEASEKOMD-KPEIN:,,Base de prix de la condition
 LINE/ EKOMD-KMEIN:,,Unit de quantit de la condition
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_PLANT
 LINEASUniquement s'il s'agit de contrats centraux.
 LINEASLigne intermdiaire prcdant la liste des conditions s'appliquant
 LINE  spcialement  la division EKOMD-WERKS.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_VALID
 LINEASEdition de la priode de validit des conditions.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_SCALE_FROM
 LINEASS'il s'agit de conditions affectes  un barme "de" : dsignation de la
 LINE  condition.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_SCALE_TO
 LINEASS'il s'agit de conditions affectes  un barme ""  : dsignation de la
 LINE  condition.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_SCALE_FROM_I
 LINEASS'il s'agit de conditions affectes  un barme "de" croissant :
 LINE  dsignation de la condition
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_SCALE_TO_I
 LINEASS'il s'agit de conditions affectes  un barme "" croissant :
 LINE  dsignation de la condition.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_QUANT_SCALE
 LINEASLigne du niveau de barme s'il s'agit de barmes de quantit, de poids
 LINE  et de volume sans base de prix (conditions relatives).
 LINEASSignification des variables :
 LINEASEKOMD-KSTBM :,,Base du barme : quantit
 LINE/ EKOMD-KONMS :,,Unit de quantit
 LINE/ EKOMD-KBETR :,,Montant de la condition
 LINE/ EKOMD-KOEIN :,,Unit d'dition (devise, unit de quantit ou %)
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_QUANT_SCALE_U
 LINEASLigne du niveau de barme s'il s'agit de barmes de quantit, de poids
 LINE  et de volume affects  une base de prix.
 LINEASSignification des variables diffrntes de ITEM_MCONDITIONS_QUANT_SCALE :
 LINEASEKOMD-KPEIN :,,Base de prix de la condition
 LINE/ EKOMD-KMEIN :,,Unit de quantit de la condition
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_VALUE_SCALE
 LINEASLigne du niveau de barme de valeur sans base de prix (conditions
 LINE  relatives).
 LINEASSignification des variables :
 LINEASEKOMD-KSTBW:,,base du barme - valeur
 LINE/ EKOMD-KONWS:,,cl de devise de la condition
 LINE/ EKOMD-KBETR:,,montant de la condition
 LINE/ EKOMD-KOEIN:,,unit d'dition (devise, unit de quantit ou %)
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_VALUE_SCALE_U
 LINEASLigne du niveau de barme pour des ristournes avec base de prix.
 LINEASVariables : cf. ITEM_MCONDITIONS_VALUE_SCALE ou
 LINE  ITEM_MCONDITIONS_QUANT_SCALE_UNIT
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - HEAD_MCONDITIONS
 LINEASIntitul des conditions d'en-tte
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_SCHEDULE_HEADER_NEW
 LINEASIntitul des lignes d'chances dans un poste de commande ou de demande
 LINE  d'offres (dans la commande uniquement lors d'une rimpression).
 LINEASLa variable RM06P-PHTXT comprend la chane Heure si une heure figure
 LINE  dans au moins une chance.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_SCHEDULE_HEADER
 LINEASIntitul des lignes d'chances lors de modifications de commandes.
 LINEASLa variable RM06P-PHTXT comprend la chane Heure si une heure figure
 LINE  dans au moins une chance.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_SCHEDULE
 LINEASLigne d'chance de la commande/demande d'offres si la date de livraison
 LINE  est exprime en semaines ou en mois.
 LINEASVariables :
 LINEASRM06P-PRMG1:,,Quantit chance
 LINE/ T006A-MSEHT:,,Dsignation de l'unit d'achat
 LINE/ RM06P-PRITX:,,Texte "semaine" ou "Mois"
 LINE/ RM06P-LFDAT:,,Date de livraison
 LINE/ RM06P-PHTXT:,,Texte indiquant le numro de la relance
 LINE/ ,,,,,,,,(uniquement pour des impressions de relance)
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_SCHEDULE_DAY
 LINEASLigne d'chance dans les commandes/demandes d'offres s'il s'agit
 LINE  d'chances au jour le jour
 LINEASVariables : cf. ITEM_SCHEDULE
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_SCHEDULE_HEADER_L1
 LINEASIntitul des lignes d'chances lors de l'impression d'chances du
 LINE  programme de livraisons respectant les conditions suivantes :
 LINEB1Pas d'impression de relance
 LINEB1Pas de reprsentation de la quantit cumule
 LINEB1Pas d'impression des quantits EM en cours
 LINEASLa variable RM06P-PHTXT comprend la chane Heure si une heure figure
 LINE  dans au moins une chance.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_SCHEDULE_HEADER_L2
 LINEASIntitul des lignes d'chances lors de l'impression des chances du
 LINE  programme de livraisons respectant les conditions suivantes :
 LINEB1Impression de la relance
 LINEB1Pas de reprsentation de la quantit cumule
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_SCHEDULE_HEADER_L3
 LINEASIntitul des lignes d'chances lors de l'impression des chances du
 LINE  programme de livraisons respectant les conditions suivantes :
 LINEB1Pas d'impression des relances
 LINEB1Reprsentation de la quantit cumule
 LINEB1Pas d'impression des quantits EM en cours
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_SCHEDULE_HEADER_L4

 LINE  programme de livraisons respectant les conditions suivantes :
 LINEB1Pas d'impression de la relance
 LINEB1Pas de reprsentation de la quantit cumule
 LINEB1Impression des quantits EM en cours

 LINE  programme de livraisons respectant les conditions suivantes :
 LINEB1Pas d'impression des relances

 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - SRV
 LINE* Cet lment de texte regroupe tous les lments de texte faisant partie
 LINE  des services  l'exception des lments ditant des conditions. Les
 LINE  lments de textes des Achats sont en effet utiliss pour l'dition de
 LINE  conditions. Ils commencent par ITEM_CONDITION dans les conditions de
 LINE  document et par ITEM_MCONDITION dans les conditions de base.
 LINE* Toutes les routines FORM, spcialement requises pour l'impression des
 LINE  services, figurent dans le programme FM06PF04. ML_ESLL correspond  la
 LINE  vue principale renseignant ces lments de texte. Vous pouvez utiliser
 LINE  dans ces lments toutes les zones dfinies dans cette vue.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ZIELWERT
 LINE* La valeur attendue des services non planifis est dite  ce niveau.
 LINE  Vous pouvez utiliser toutes les zones de la table ESUH. Cette valeur
 LINE  apparat uniquement si elle est diffrente de zro et si le code
 LINE  d'impression des prix est activ.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - CZIELWERT
 LINE*
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - SERVICES
 LINE* Il s'agit du principal lment, les donnes d'une ligne de service tant
 LINE  en effet dites  ce niveau ainsi que les lignes de la structure
 LINE  hirarchique concerne, si elles existent. Les services sont attribus
 LINE  aux niveaux de la hirarchie.
 LINE* Les zones de ML_ESLL sont mises  disposition. PRINT_GLIEDERUNG et
 LINE  PRINT_SRVPOS correspondent aux routines centrales renseignant cet
 LINE  lment de texte.
 LINE*
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - SRV_ABRUF
 LINE* Les donnes d'appel d'une commande ou de services sont dites  ce
 LINE  niveau sur la base de la structure d'aide RM11P. Seules les zones
 LINE  rm11p-pln_extrow et rm11p-pln_grp sont renseignes. PRINT_ABRUFDATEN
 LINE  correspond  la routine renseignant cet lment de texte.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - TIME_DATA
 LINE* Les donnes de temps sont dites sous la forme dont elles peuvent tre
 LINE  saisies dans la gestion des services. PRINT_TIME correspond  la routine
 LINE  renseignant cet lment de texte.
 LINE*
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - FORMEL_KOPF
 LINE* Les donnes de la formule utilise dans la ligne des services sont
 LINE  dites  ce niveau. print_formel correspond  la routine renseignant
 LINE  cet lment de texte.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - FORMEL_BODY
 LINE* Les donnes des variables utilises dans cette formule sont dites  ce
 LINE  niveau. print_formel correspond  la routine renseignant cet lment de
 LINE  texte.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - DEL_SERVICE
 LINE*
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - DEL_GLIEDR
 LINE*
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - CHANGE_SERVICE
 LINE*
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INV_SCHED_PERIODIC
 LINE* La date de dbut et de fin ainsi que le texte standard du programme de
 LINE  facturation priodique d'un poste de commande sont dits  ce
 LINE  niveau. Les routines renseignant cet lment de texte figurent dans le
 LINE  programme FM06PF05.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INV_SCHED_PERCENT_HEADER
 LINE* Le pourcentage correspondant et la dsignation de la date sont dits
 LINE  dans la premire ligne du plan de facturation partiel relatif. Les
 LINE  routines renseignant cet lment de texte figurent dans le programme
 LINE  FM06PF05.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INV_SCHED_PERCENT
 LINE* Le pourcentage et la dsignation de la date sont dits  ce niveau pour
 LINE  toutes les lignes suivantes du plan de facturation partiel relatif. Les
 LINE  routines renseignant cet lment de texte figurent dans le programme
 LINE  FM06PF05.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INV_SCHED_VALUE_HEADER
 LINE* Le montant partiel, la devise et la dsignation de la date sont dits
 LINE  dans la premire ligne du plan de facturation rparti en valeur. Les
 LINE  routines renseignant cet lment de texte figurent dans le programme
 LINE  FM06PF05.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INV_SCHED_VALUE
 LINE* Les montants partiels, la devise et les dsignations des dates sont
 LINE  dits dans toutes les lignes du plan de facturation partiel rparti par
 LINE  valeur. Les routines renseignant cet lment de texte figurent dans le
 LINE  programme FM06PF05.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - MAINTANCE_SCHED_HEADER
 LINE* Les donnes du plan d'entretien affect au poste de commande sont
 LINE  dites  ce niveau (numro du plan d'entretien et donnes du cycle
 LINE  d'entretien). PRINT_MAINTANCE_SCHEDULE correspond  la routine
 LINE  renseignant cet lment de texte.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - MAINTANCE_SCHED_POS
 LINE* Les donnes du poste du plan d'entretien affect sont dites  ce
 LINE  niveau. PRINT_MAINTANCE_SCHEDULE correspond  la routine renseignant cet
 LINE  lment de texte.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - SRV_WS
 LINE* Les donnes dfinies dans le plan d'entretien affect au poste de la
 LINE  commande sont dites  ce niveau (comme dans l'lment de texte MAIN -
 LINE  SRV).
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - SERVICES_WS
 LINE* Les donnes dfinies dans le plan d'entretien affect au poste de la
 LINE  commande sont dites  ce niveau (comme dans l'lment de texte MAIN -
 LINE  SERVICES).
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - TIME_DATA_WS
 LINE* Les donnes dfinies dans le plan d'entretien affect au poste de la
 LINE  commande sont dites  ce niveau (comme dans l'lment de texte MAIN -
 LINE  FORMEL_KOPF).
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - FORMEL_KOPF_WS
 LINE* Les donnes dfinies dans le plan d'entretien affect au poste de la
 LINE  commande sont dites  ce niveau (comme dans l'lment de texte MAIN -
 LINE  FORMEL_KOPF).
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - FORMEL_BODY_WS
 LINE* Les donnes dfinies dans le plan d'entretien affect au poste de la
 LINE  commande sont dites  ce niveau (comme dans l'lment de texte MAIN -
 LINE  FORMEL_BODY_WS)
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - TOTAL_AMOUNT_ITEMS
 LINEASValeur nette de tous les postes.
 LINEASSignification des variables :
 LINEASEKKO-WAERS:,,Devise du document
 LINE/ KOMK-SUPOS:,,Valeur nette totale
 LINEASCet lment est uniquement appel si le code d'impression du prix est
 LINE  activ dans tous les postes.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - TOTAL_AMOUNT
 LINEASValeur nette totale du document (y compris conditions d'en-tte)
 LINEASSignification des variables :
 LINEASEKKO-WAERS:,,Devise du document
 LINE/ KOMK-FKWRT:,,Valeur nette totale
 LINEASCet lment est uniquement appel si le code d'impression du prix est
 LINE  activ dans tous les postes.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - SUPPL_TEXT
 LINEASTextes d'annexe configurs dans l'IMG sous <LS>Dtermination des
 LINE  messages -> Textes des messages -> Dterminer textes du <document
 LINE  d'achat -> Textes de l'en-tte du document</>.
 LINEASLa variable TTXIT-TDTEXT correspond  la dsignation du texte. Elle
 LINE  n'est renseigne que si le code <LS>Imprimer dsignation</> est activ
 LINE  dans l'IMG.
 LINEASAutres variables de cet lment de texte :
 LINEAST166A-TDOBJECT:,,objet de texte (ex. : EKKO des textes d'annexe de
 LINE/ commande)
 LINE/ T166A-TDID:,,,,ID de texte (ex. : F12 pour les annexes)
 LINE/ T166A-TXNAM:,,Nom du texte (pour les textes de document, il s'agit du
 LINE/ ,,,,,,,,numro standard, pour les textes standard, du nom du texte ,,,,
 LINE  ,,,,standard).
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - LAST
 LINEASLe texte comprenant la formule de politesse est intgre  ce niveau
 LINE  sous forme d'include. Vous affectez le texte dans l'IMG,  l'tape
 LINE  <LS>Dtermination des messages -> Textes pour messages -> Dterminer
 LINE  textes de l'organisation d'achat</>. Vous excutez cette affectation
 LINE  dans la zone <LS>Texte formule de politesse</> de l'cran de dtail.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - PROTECT
 LINE*
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ENDPROTECT
 LINE*
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - MS_SERVICE_HEADER_CONDITIONS
 LINE*
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - MS_TOTAL_AMOUNT_ITEM
 LINE*
 END

 LINE/WADDRESS   F
 LINE/:IF &PAGE& EQ 1.
 LINE/:INCLUDE &T024E-TXADR& OBJECT TEXT ID ADRS LANGUAGE &EKKO-SPRAS&
 LINE*
 LINE/:ENDIF.
 LINE/:IF &EKKO-ADRNR(K)& EQ '          '
 LINE/:ADDRESS PARAGRAPH AS
 LINE/:  TITLE    &LFA1-ANRED&
 LINE/:  NAME     &LFA1-NAME1&, &LFA1-NAME2&, &LFA1-NAME3&, &LFA1-NAME4&
 LINE/:  STREET   &LFA1-STRAS&
 LINE/:  POBOX    &LFA1-PFACH&  CODE &LFA1-PSTL2&
 LINE/:  CITY     &LFA1-ORT01&, &LFA1-ORT02&
 LINE/:  POSTCODE &LFA1-PSTLZ&
 LINE/:  COUNTRY  &LFA1-LAND1&
 LINE/:  REGION   &LFA1-REGIO&
 LINE/:  FROMCOUNTRY &T001-LAND1&
 LINE/:ENDADDRESS
 LINE/:ELSE
 LINE/:ADDRESS PARAGRAPH AS
 LINE/:  ADDRESSNUMBER &EKKO-ADRNR(K)&
 LINE/:  FROMCOUNTRY &T001-LAND1&
 LINE/:ENDADDRESS
 LINE/:ENDIF
 LINE/WCONSGNEE  F
 LINE/EHEADER_DELADDRESS
 LINEASKrjk a kvetkez# cmre szlltsanak:
 LINE/:IF &PEKKO-ADRNR(K)& EQ '          ' AND &PEKKO-ADRN2(K)& EQ '          '
 LINE/:ADDRESS DELIVERY PARAGRAPH AS
 LINE/:  TITLE    &SADR-ANRED&
 LINE/:  NAME     &SADR-NAME1&, &SADR-NAME2&, &SADR-NAME3&, &SADR-NAME4&
 LINE/:  STREET   &SADR-STRAS&
 LINE/:  CITY     &SADR-ORT01&, &SADR-ORT02&
 LINE/:  POSTCODE &SADR-PSTLZ&
 LINE/:  COUNTRY  &SADR-LAND1&
 LINE/:  REGION   &SADR-REGIO&
 LINE/:  FROMCOUNTRY &LFA1-LAND1&
 LINE/:ENDADDRESS
 LINE/:ELSE

 LINEUL&uline(71)&
 LINE/EITEM_YWERT

 LINE/EITEM_TAB
 LINE/:CASE &VARPOSR-YZEILE&
 LINE/:WHEN '0001'
 LINE/:DEFINE &TAB& = ',,'
 LINE/:WHEN '0002'
 LINE/:DEFINE &TAB& = ',,,,'
 LINE/:WHEN '0003'
 LINE/:DEFINE &TAB& = ',,,,,,'
 LINE/:WHEN '0004'
 LINE/:DEFINE &TAB& = ',,,,,,,,'
 LINE/:WHEN '0005'
 LINE/:DEFINE &TAB& = ',,,,,,,,,,'
 LINE/:WHEN '0006'
 LINE/:DEFINE &TAB& = ',,,,,,,,,,,,'
 LINE/:WHEN '0007'
 LINE/:DEFINE &TAB& = ',,,,,,,,,,,,,,'
 LINE/:WHEN OTHERS.
 LINE* Tab nincs definilva
 LINE/:ENDCASE
 LINE/EITEM_YMENGE
 LINE* &tab& &varposr-xymenge&

 LINEWHSUMME

 LINE* &tab& &mtxh-gsum(Z)&

 LINE/:DEFINE &TAB& = ',,,,'
 LINE/:WHEN '0003'
 LINE/:DEFINE &TAB& = ',,,,,,'
 LINE/:WHEN '0004'
 LINE/:DEFINE &TAB& = ',,,,,,,,'
 LINE/:WHEN '0005'
 LINE/:DEFINE &TAB& = ',,,,,,,,,,'
 LINE/:WHEN '0006'
 LINE/:DEFINE &TAB& = ',,,,,,,,,,,,'
 LINE/:WHEN '0007'
 LINE/:DEFINE &TAB& = ',,,,,,,,,,,,,,'
 LINE/:WHEN OTHERS.
 LINE* Tab. non definita
 LINE/:ENDCASE
 LINE/EITEM_YMENGE
 LINE* &tab& &varposr-xymenge&
 LINE/EITEM_YSUMME
 LINEWHSUMME

 LINE/*deve eliminare l'interrogazione IF

 LINE/EHEADER_DELADDRESS
 LINEASConsegnare a:
 LINE/:IF &PEKKO-ADRNR(K)& EQ '          ' AND &PEKKO-ADRN2(K)& EQ '          '
 LINE/:ADDRESS DELIVERY PARAGRAPH AS
 LINE/:  TITLE    &SADR-ANRED&
 LINE/:  NAME     &SADR-NAME1&, &SADR-NAME2&, &SADR-NAME3&, &SADR-NAME4&
 LINE/:  STREET   &SADR-STRAS&
 LINE/:  CITY     &SADR-ORT01&, &SADR-ORT02&
 LINE/:  POSTCODE &SADR-PSTLZ&
 LINE/:  COUNTRY  &SADR-LAND1&
 LINE/:  REGION   &SADR-REGIO&
 LINE/:  FROMCOUNTRY &LFA1-LAND1&
 LINE/:ENDADDRESS
 LINE/:ELSE
 LINE/:IF &PEKKO-ADRNR(K)& NE '          '
 LINE/:ADDRESS DELIVERY PARAGRAPH AS
 LINE/:  ADDRESSNUMBER &PEKKO-ADRNR(K)&
 LINE/:  FROMCOUNTRY &LFA1-LAND1&
 LINE/:ENDADDRESS
 LINE/:ELSE
 LINE/:ADDRESS DELIVERY PARAGRAPH AS
 LINE/:  ADDRESSNUMBER &PEKKO-ADRN2(K)&
 LINE/:  FROMCOUNTRY &LFA1-LAND1&
 LINE/:ENDADDRESS
 LINE/:ENDIF
 LINE/:ENDIF
 LINE/WADDRESS   F
 LINE/:IF &PAGE& EQ 1.
 LINE/:INCLUDE &T024E-TXADR& OBJECT TEXT ID ADRS LANGUAGE &EKKO-SPRAS&
 LINE*
 LINE/:ENDIF.
 LINE/:IF &EKKO-ADRNR(K)& EQ '          '
 LINE/:ADDRESS PARAGRAPH AS
 LINE/:  TITLE    &LFA1-ANRED&
 LINE/:  NAME     &LFA1-NAME1&, &LFA1-NAME2&, &LFA1-NAME3&, &LFA1-NAME4&
 LINE/:  STREET   &LFA1-STRAS&
 LINE/:  POBOX    &LFA1-PFACH&  CODE &LFA1-PSTL2&
 LINE/:  CITY     &LFA1-ORT01&, &LFA1-ORT02&
 LINE/:  POSTCODE &LFA1-PSTLZ&
 LINE/:  COUNTRY  &LFA1-LAND1&
 LINE/:  REGION   &LFA1-REGIO&
 LINE/:  FROMCOUNTRY &T001-LAND1&
 LINE/:ENDADDRESS
 LINE/:ELSE
 LINE/:ADDRESS PARAGRAPH AS
 LINE/:  ADDRESSNUMBER &EKKO-ADRNR(K)&
 LINE/:  FROMCOUNTRY &T001-LAND1&
 LINE/:ENDADDRESS
 LINE/:ENDIF
 LINE/W%%DOCU
 LINE>0U1FORM : YCH02_04_MEDRUCK
 LINEASOrdini d'acquisto
 LINE>1U1PAGE : FIRST
 LINEASPrima pagina
 LINE>2U1PAGE : NEXT
 LINEASPagina successiva
 LINE>3U1WINDOW : ADDRESS
 LINEASTrattasi della finestra dell'indirizzo del documento, la quale contiene
 LINE  essenzialmente l'indirizzo del fornitore.
 LINEASNell'indirizzo del fornitore della prima pagina viene visualizzato
 LINE  ancora l'indirizzo dell'organizzazione acquisti, il quale  archiviato
 LINE  nel testo standard T024E-TXADR attribuito nella Guida di implementazione
 LINE  al passo di lavoro <LS>Determinazione messaggi -> Testi per messaggi ->
 LINE  Testi per organizzazione acquisti</>, e pi precisamente nel campo
 LINE  <LS>Testo indirizzo</> della videata di dettaglio.
 LINEASTenere conto del fatto che, nelle pagine successive, la finestra consta
 LINE  di sole tre righe, valutando quindi l'eventualit di escludere le
 LINE  singole righe dell'indirizzo del fornitore.
 LINE>4U1WINDOW : CONSGNEE
 LINEASIndirizzo di spedizione
 LINE>3U1WINDOW : DELDATE
 LINEASScadenze
 LINE>4U1WINDOW : FOOTER
 LINEASRighe a pi di pagina
 LINE>3U1WINDOW : HEADER
 LINEASRighe testata/Logo
 LINE>4U1WINDOW : INFO
 LINEASInformazioni generali - destra
 LINE>3U1WINDOW : INFO1
 LINEASInformazioni generali - sinistra
 LINE>4U1WINDOW : INFO2
 LINEASInformazioni generali - destra
 LINE>3U1WINDOW : MAIN
 LINEASFinestra principale
 LINE>4U1WINDOW : PAGE
 LINEASNumero di pagina
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : DELDATE - HEADER_DATES
 LINE*
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : DELDATE - DELDATE
 LINE*
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : CONSGNEE - HEADER_DELADDRESS
 LINE*
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - HEADER_TEXT
 LINEASRiporta i testi relativi alla testata, i quali vengono parametrizzati
 LINE  nella Guida d'implementazione in <LS>Messaggi -> Testi per messaggi ->
 LINE  Determinare testi per <documento d'acquisto> -> Testi per testata
 LINE  documento</>.
 LINEASLa variabile TTXIT-TDTEXT contiene la denominazione del testo (ad
 LINE  esempio "Accordo accessorio") e viene alimentata solamente quando nel
 LINE  punto sopra menzionato della Guida d'implementazione viene impostato
 LINE  l'indicatore <LS>Stampare denominazione</>.
 LINEASLe altre variabili di questo elemento di testo sono:
 LINEAST166K-TDOBJECT:,,Oggetto di testo (ad esempio EKKO per i testi relativi
 LINE/ ,,,,,,,,alla testata del documento)
 LINE/ T166K-TDID:,,,,ID del testo (ad esempio F01 per il testo relativo alla
 LINE/ ,,,,,,,,testata dell'ordine d'acquisto)
 LINE/ T166K-TXNAM:,,Nome del testo (il numero del documento per i testi
 LINE/ ,,,,,,,,relativi al documento, oppure il nome del testo standard per i
 LINE/ ,,,,,,,,testi standard)
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - HEADER_INFO_ACKNOW
 LINEASQuesto elemento viene visualizzato quando:
 LINEB1In tutte le posizioni compare l'indicatore <LS>Conferma d'ordine</>
 LINEB1Non tutte le posizioni riportano un numero di conferma d'ordine
 LINEB1Trattasi di una stampa del sollecito relativo alla conferma d'ordine
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - TERMS
 LINEASContiene le condizioni di consegna (Incoterms) e la prima riga delle
 LINE  condizioni di pagamento.
 LINEASI campi EKKO-INCO1 e EKKO-INCO2 vengono alimentati solamente se le
 LINE  condizioni di consegna sono identiche in tutte le posizioni. In caso
 LINE  contrario, gli Incoterms vengono stampati a livello della posizione.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - TERMS_OF_PAYMENT
 LINEASContiene le altre righe delle condizioni di pagamento.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - HEADER_TARGET_VALUE
 LINEASRappresenta il valore di destinazione di un contratto quadro o di una
 LINE  richiesta d'offerta. La visualizzazione avviene solamente se nel
 LINE  documento  stato inserito un valore di destinazione. Nel caso di
 LINE  schedulazioni del piano di consegna non viene visualizzato alcun dato.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - REASON_FOR_REJECTION
 LINE*
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - CHANGE_REMARKS
 LINEASContiene le indicazioni relative a quali dati del documento sono stati
 LINE  modificati. Ci concerne solamente la stampa delle modifiche.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_HEADER_F
 LINEASContiene l'intestazione relativa alla lista delle posizioni del
 LINE  documento nel contesto dell'ordine d'acquisto.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_DATE
 LINEASRiporta la data di consegna per posizione nell'ordine d'acquisto. Questa
 LINE  data si riferisce esclusivamente all'ordine d'acquisto.
 LINEASQualora la data di consegna venga espressa in settimane o mesi,
 LINE  considerare le seguenti variabili, nonch il relativo contenuto:
 LINEASRM06P-PRITX:,,Riporta il testo "Settimana" oppure "Mese"
 LINE/ RM06P-LFDAT:,,Riporta la data di consegna
 LINE/ RM06P-PHTXT:,,Nel contesto della stampa dei solleciti, riporta un
 LINE/ ,,,,,,,,appunto di testo che identifica il numero del sollecito
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_WEMNG
 LINEASNel contesto della stampa dei solleciti, contiene le informazioni
 LINE  relative alla quantit ancora da consegnare per ogni posizione.
 LINEASLa variabile RM06P-PRMG2 riporta la quantit in formato di stampa,
 LINE  mentre la variabile T006A-MSEHT esplicita la definizione dell'unit di
 LINE  misura.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_LINE_2F
 LINEASRappresenta la seconda riga nelle posizioni dell'ordine d'acquisto,
 LINE  qualora non venga visualizzato alcun prezzo (il prezzo corrisponde a 0 o
 LINE  l'indicatore di stampa del prezzo non  stato impostato), oppure esista
 LINE  un'unit di misura dell'ordine d'acquisto diversa.
 LINEASLa variabile RM06P-PRMG1 contiene la quantit dell'ordine d'acquisto in
 LINE  visualizzazione di stampa, mentre la variante T006A-MSEHT riporta la
 LINE  definizione dell'unit di misura dell'ordine d'acquisto.
 LINEASNella stampa dei solleciti delle conferme d'ordine, nel campo
 LINE  RM06P-PRMG2 viene visualizzata la quantit gi confermata, qualora essa
 LINE  sia superiore a 0, ma inferiore alla quantit ordinata.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_LINE_3F
 LINEASRappresenta la seconda riga nelle posizioni dell'ordine d'acquisto in
 LINE  cui viene visualizzato un prezzo, il quale, per, non  contenuto nella
 LINE  riga in questione (nel caso in cui, ad esempio, il prezzo si componga di
 LINE  diversi tipi di condizione).
 LINEASRM06P-PRMG1 contiene la quantit espressa nell'unit di misura del
 LINE  prezzo dell'ordine d'acquisto, mentre T006A-MSEHT riporta la definizione
 LINE  dell'unit di misura del prezzo dell'ordine d'acquisto.
 LINEASPer quanto concerne RM06P-PRMG2, fare riferimento all'elemento di testo
 LINE  ITEM_LINE_2F.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_LINE_3F_PRICE
 LINEASRappresenta la seconda riga nelle posizioni dell'ordine d'acquisto in
 LINE  cui il prezzo viene visualizzato nella riga in questione.
 LINEASLe variabili che non sono gi contenute in ITEM_LINE_3F hanno i seguenti
 LINE  significati:
 LINEASEKPO-NETPR:,,,,Prezzo netto della posizione (e quindi per ogni unit)
 LINE/ RM06P-PRPEI:,,Unit di prezzo
 LINE/ EKPO-NETWR:,,,,Valore netto totale della posizione
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_HEADER_A
 LINEASRiporta l'intestazione relativa alla lista delle posizioni del
 LINE  documentonel contesto di una richiesta d'ordine.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_LINE_A
 LINEASRappresenta la riga della posizione nella richiesta d'offerta.
 LINEASLe singole variabili hanno i seguenti significati:
 LINEASEKPO-EBELP:,,,,Numero della posizione
 LINE/ EKPO-EMATN:,,,,Codice materiale
 LINE/ EKPO-TXZ01:,,,,Testo breve relativo al materiale
 LINE/ RM06P-PRMG1:,,Quantit richiesta in formato di stampa
 LINE/ T006A-MSEHT:,,Definizione dell'unit di misura
 LINE/ EKPO-AGDAT:,,,,Scadenza dell'offerta
 LINE/ RM06P-PRITX:,,Testo "Settimana" o "Mese" per date di richiesta in
 LINE/ ,,,,,,,,formato settimanale o mensile
 LINE/ RM06P-LFDAT:,,Data di consegna richiesta
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_HEADER_R
 LINEASIntestazione relativa alla lista delle posizioni del documento nel
 LINE  contesto di un contratto quadro
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_LINE_2R
 LINEASRappresenta la seconda riga nelle posizioni del contratto, qualora non
 LINE  venga visualizzato alcun prezzo (il prezzo corrisponde a 0 o
 LINE  l'indicatore di stampa del prezzo non  stato impostato), oppure esista
 LINE  un'unit di misura dell'ordine d'acquisto diversa.
 LINEASLa variabile RM06P-PRMG1 contiene la quantit di destinazione del
 LINE  contratto in visualizzazione di stampa, mentre la variabile T006A-MSEHT
 LINE  riporta la definizione dell'unit di misura dell'ordine d'acquisto.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_LINE_3R
 LINEASRappresenta la seconda riga nelle posizioni del contratto nelle quali
 LINE  viene visualizzato un prezzo.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_1
 LINEASNella stampa di schedulazioni del piano di consegna, in questo punto
 LINE  vengono stampate prima della lista delle schedulazioni le informazioni
 LINE  generali relative alla posizione del piano di consegna (codice del
 LINE  materiale, quantit fornita,ecc.).
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_FZ
 LINEASValido
 LINE  solo per la stampa di schedulazioni del piano di consegna:
 LINEASDati dell'ultima entrata merci (quantit consegnata, data di consegna,
 LINE  numero del documento di trasporto)
 LINEASQuesto elemento di testo appare solamente quando la rappresentazione dei
 LINE  numeri progressivi  attiva. Ci si ottiene attribuendo al tipo di
 LINE  messaggio la popup routine ENTRY_LPFZ (lo standard di sistema prevede il
 LINE  messaggio LPFZ) nell'attribuzione di programma, routine e modulo, oppure
 LINE  attribuendo una routine propria dell'utente in cui la variabile XFZ sia
 LINE  impostata su 'X'.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_ABRFZ
 LINEASValido solo per la stampa di schedulazioni del piano di consegna con
 LINE  documentazione dell'ordine di consegna:
 LINEASDati dell'ultima entrata merci
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_REC
 LINEASValido solo per la stampa di schedulazioni del piano di consegna e
 LINE  unicamente se la rappresentazione di numeri progressivi  attiva (vedi
 LINE  ITEM_INFO_FZ):
 LINEASVisualizzazione del numero progressivo di riconciliazione con la data di
 LINE  riconciliazione
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_ZONE1
 LINEASValido solo per la stampa di schedulazioni del piano di consegna:
 LINEASVisualizzazione della data di fine del primo periodo fisso (periodo di
 LINE  rilascio della produzione)
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_ZONE2
 LINEASValido solo per la stampa di schedulazioni del piano di consegna:
 LINEASVisualizzazione della data di fine del secondo periodo fisso (periodo di
 LINE  rilascio del materiale)
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_VKP
 LINE*
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_LINE_1
 LINEASPrima riga della posizione relativa ad un ordine d'acquisto, oppure ad
 LINE  un contratto quadro.
 LINEASLe variabili hanno il seguente significato:
 LINEASEKPO-EBELP:,,Numero della posizione
 LINE/ EKPO-EMATN:,,Codice del materiale
 LINE/ EKPO-TXZ01:,,Testo breve del materiale
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_2
 LINEASVisualizza informazioni supplementari relative alla posizione (dopo le
 LINE  righe della posizione effettive) e concerne tutti i tipi di documento.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_ACKNOW
 LINEASViene visualizzato se l'indicatore <LS>Obbligo di conferma d'ordine</> 
 LINE  stato impostato per le singole posizioni.
 LINEASNon viene visualizzato se:
 LINEB1Esiste gi un numero di conferma d'ordine nella posizione
 LINEB1Si tratta di un sollecito della conferma d'ordine
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_QM_1
 LINEASVisualizza il tipo di certificato richiesto per ogni consegna.
 LINEASCi avviene quando:
 LINEB1Il tipo di certificato risiede nella posizione del documento
 LINEB1La chiave di controllo QM della posizione prevede che il certificato sia
 LINE  obbligatorio
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_INFO_QM_2
 LINEASVisualizza il tipo di certificato richiesto per ogni consegna.
 LINEASCi avviene quando:
 LINEB1Il tipo di certificato risiede nella posizione del documento
 LINEB1La chiave di controllo QM della posizione prevede che il certificato sia
 LINE  obbligatorio
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - QM_TEXT
 LINEASVisualizza i testi 'Accordo di qualit' e 'Condizioni di consegna
 LINE  tecniche' dal QM (se disponibile)
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_TEXT
 LINEASRiporta i testi
 LINE  relativi alla posizione, i quali vengono parametrizzati nella Guida
 LINE  d'implementazione alla voce <LS>Messaggi -> Testi per messaggi ->
 LINE  Determinare testi per <documento d'acquisto> -> Testi per posizione
 LINE  documento</>.
 LINEASLa variabile TTXIT-TDTEXT contiene la denominazione del testo (ad
 LINE  esempio "Testo ordine d'acquisto del materiale"), e viene alimentata
 LINE  solamente quando nel punto sopra menzionato della Guida
 LINE  d'implementazione viene impostato l'indicatore <LS>Stampare
 LINE  denominazione</>.
 LINEASLe altre variabili di questo elemento di testo sono:
 LINEAST166P-TDOBJECT:,,Oggetto di testo (ad esempio EKPO per i testi relativi
 LINE/ ,,,,,,,,alla posizione)
 LINE/ T166P-TDID:,,,,ID del testo (ad esempio F01 per il testo relativo alla
 LINE/ ,,,,,,,,posizione dell'ordine d'acquisto)
 LINE/ T166P-TXNAM:,,Nome del testo (il numero del documento per i testi
 LINE/ ,,,,,,,,relativi al documento, oppure il nome del testo standard per i
 LINE/ ,,,,,,,,testi standard)
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_DELADDRESS
 LINEASRiporta l'indirizzo di fornitura, qualora esso venga stampato al livello
 LINE  della posizione.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_RECIEVER
 LINE*
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_RECIEVER_WQ
 LINE*
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_RECIEVER_WP
 LINE*
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_CONDITIONS
 LINEASValido solo per ordini di consegna e piani di consegna con condizioni a
 LINE  dipendenza temporale.
 LINEASVisualizzazione dei tipi di condizione senza unit di prezzo (condizioni
 LINE  percentuali):
 LINEASKOMVD-VTEXT:,,Definizione della condizione
 LINE/ KOMVD-KBETR:,,Importo della condizione
 LINE/ KOMVD-KOEIN:,,Unit di visualizzazione (divisa, unit di misura o '%')
 LINE/ KOMVD-KWERT:,,Valore totale della condizione
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_CONDITIONS_UNIT
 LINEASValido solo per ordini di consegna e piani di consegna con condizioni a
 LINE  dipendenza temporale.
 LINEASVisualizzazione dei tipi di condizione con unit di prezzo (condizioni
 LINE  basate sulla quantit, sul peso, ecc.):
 LINEASOltre a ITEM_CONDITIONS, esistono anche:
 LINEASKOMVD-KPEIN:,,Unit di prezzo della condizione (ad esempio per ogni 100
 LINE  ,,,,,,pezzi)
 LINE/ KOMVD-KMEIN:,,Unit di misura della condizione (ST nell'esempio di cui
 LINE  ,,,,,,sopra)
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS
 LINEASValido solo per contratti e piani di consegna con condizioni a
 LINE  dipendenza temporale.
 LINEASVisualizzazione dei tipi di condizione senza unit di prezzo (condizioni
 LINE  percentuali):
 LINEASEKOMD-VTEXT:,,Definizione della condizione
 LINE/ EKOMD-KBETR:,,Importo della condizione
 LINE/ EKOMD-KOEIN:,,Unit di visualizzazione (divisa, unit di misura o '%')
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_UNIT
 LINEASValido solo per contratti e piani di consegna con condizioni a
 LINE  dipendenza temporale.
 LINEASVisualizzazione dei tipi di condizione con unit di prezzo (condizioni
 LINE  basate sulla quantit, sul peso, ecc.):
 LINEASOltre a ITEM_MCONDITIONS, esistono le seguenti variabili:
 LINEASEKOMD-KPEIN:,,Unit di prezzo della condizione
 LINE/ EKOMD-KMEIN:,,Unit di misura della condizione
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_PLANT
 LINEASValido solo per contratti centrali.
 LINEASContiene la riga intermedia dopo la quale vengono elencate le condizioni
 LINE  che valgono in special modo per la divisione EKOMD-WERKS.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_VALID
 LINEASVisualizza il periodo di validit di condizioni.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_SCALE_FROM
 LINEASIn condizioni con 'Scaglionare da': definizione della condizione.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_SCALE_TO
 LINEASIn condizioni con 'Scaglionare fino a': definizione della condizione.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_SCALE_FROM_I
 LINEASIn condizioni con 'Scaglionare da' aumentato: definizione della
 LINE  condizione.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_SCALE_TO_I
 LINEASIn condizioni con 'Scaglionare fino a' aumentato: definizione della
 LINE  condizione.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_QUANT_SCALE
 LINEASContiene la riga per il livello di scaglionamento nel contesto dello
 LINE  scaglionamento di quantit, peso e volume senza unit di prezzo
 LINE  (condizioni percentuali).
 LINEASLe variabili hanno il seguente significato:
 LINEASEKOMD-KSTBM:,,Quantit della base di scaglionamento
 LINE/ EKOMD-KONMS:,,Unit di misura
 LINE/ EKOMD-KBETR:,,Importo della condizione
 LINE/ EKOMD-KOEIN:,,Unit di visualizzazione (divisa, unit di misura o '%')
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_QUANT_SCALE_U
 LINEASContiene la riga per il livello di scaglionamento nel contesto dello
 LINE  scaglionamento di quantit, pesi e volumi con unit di prezzo.
 LINEASOltre a ITEM_MCONDITIONS_QUANT_SCALE, le variabili sono:
 LINEASEKOMD-KPEIN:,,Unit di prezzo della condizione
 LINE/ EKOMD-KMEIN:,,Unit di misura della condizione
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_VALUE_SCALE
 LINEASContiene la riga per il livello di scaglionamento nel contesto dello
 LINE  scaglionamento di valori senza unit di prezzo (condizioni percentuali).
 LINEASLe variabili sono:
 LINEASEKOMD-KSTBW:,,Valore della base di scaglionamento
 LINE/ EKOMD-KONWS:,,Chiave della divisa relativa alla condizione
 LINE/ EKOMD-KBETR:,,Importo della condizione
 LINE/ EKOMD-KOEIN:,,Unit di visualizzazione (divisa, unit di misura o '%')
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MCONDITIONS_VALUE_SCALE_U
 LINEASContiene la riga
 LINE  per il livello di scaglionamento nel contesto dello scaglionamento
 LINE  di valori con unit di prezzo.
 LINEASVariabili: vedi ITEM_MCONDITIONS_VALUE_SCALE oppure
 LINE  ITEM_MCONDITIONS_QUANT_SCALE_UNIT.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - HEAD_MCONDITIONS
 LINEASRiporta l'intestazione relativa alle condizioni della testata.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_SCHEDULE_HEADER_NEW
 LINEASRiporta l'intestazione relativa alle righe di schedulazione in una
 LINE  posizione di un ordine d'acquisto o di una richiesta (nell'ordine
 LINE  d'acquisto solo in caso di ristampa).
 LINEASLa variabile RM06P-PHTXT contiene la stringa 'Ora' quando in almeno una
 LINE  schedulazione viene indicato un orario.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_SCHEDULE_HEADER
 LINEASContiene l'intestazione
 LINE  relativa alle righe di schedulazione nelle modifiche di
 LINE  ordini d'acquisto.
 LINEASLa variabile RM06P-PHTXT contiene la stringa 'Ora' quando in almeno una
 LINE  schedulazione viene indicato un orario.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_SCHEDULE
 LINEASContiene la riga di schedulazione in un ordine/richiesta d'acquisto
 LINE  nel caso in cui la data di consegna sia espressa in settimane o mesi.
 LINEASLe variabili contengono:
 LINEASRM06P-PRMG1:,,Quantit schedulata
 LINE/ T006A-MSEHT:,,Definizione dell'unit di misura dell'ordine d'acquisto
 LINE/ RM06P-PRITX:,,Testo "Settimana" oppure "Mese"
 LINE/ RM06P-LFDAT:,,Data di consegna
 LINE/ RM06P-PHTXT:,,Annotazione di testo su quanti solleciti sono stati
 LINE/ ,,,,,,,,effettuati (solo nel contesto della stampa dei solleciti)
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_SCHEDULE_DAY
 LINEASContiene la riga di schedulazione in un ordine/richiesta d'acquisto nel
 LINE  caso di schedulazioni quotidiane.
 LINEASVariabili: vedi ITEM_SCHEDULE.
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_SCHEDULE_HEADER_L1
 LINEASContiene l'intestazione relativa alle righe di schedulazione nella
 LINE  stampa di schedulazioni del piano di consegna in base ai seguenti
 LINE  requisiti:
 LINEB1Nessuna stampa sollecito
 LINEB1Nessuna rappresentazione di numeri progressivi
 LINEB1Nessuna stampa di quantit EM aperte
 LINEASLa variabile RM06P-PHTXT contiene la stringa 'Ora' quando in almeno una
 LINE  schedulazione viene indicato un orario.
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_SCHEDULE_HEADER_L2
 LINEASContiene l'intestazione relativa alle righe di schedulazione nella
 LINE  stampa di schedulazioni del piano di consegna in base ai seguenti
 LINE  requisiti:
 LINEB1Stampa sollecito
 LINEB1Nessuna rappresentazione di numeri progressivi
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_SCHEDULE_HEADER_L3

 LINE  stampa di schedulazioni del piano di consegna in base ai seguenti
 LINE  requisiti:
 LINEB1Nessuna stampa sollecito
 LINEB1Nessuna rappresentazione di numeri progressivi
 LINEB1Stampa di quantit EM aperte

 LINE  requisiti:

 LINEB1Rappresentazione di numeri progressivi

 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - COMP_HEADER_1
 LINEASContiene l'intestazione relativa alla lista dei componenti messi a
 LINE  disposizione (nel contesto di posizioni dell'ordine d'acquisto o del
 LINE  piano di consegna di tipo 'Lavorazione esterna').
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - COMP_HEADER_2
 LINEASContiene l'intestazione relativa alla lista dei componenti messi a
 LINE  disposizione per una riga di schedulazione (nel contesto di posizioni
 LINE  dell'ordine d'acquisto o del piano di consegna di tipo 'Lavorazione
 LINE  esterna').
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - COMP_LINE
 LINEASRiporta la riga dei componenti messi a disposizione.
 LINEASLe variabili hanno il seguente significato:
 LINEASMDPM-MAKTX:,,,,Testo breve del componente
 LINE/ RM06P-PRMG1:,,Quantit messa a disposizione
 LINE/ T006A-MSEHT:,,Definizione dell'unit di misura
 LINE>6U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MPN_LISTHEADER
 LINE*
 LINE>5U1ELEMENT : MAIN - ITEM_MPN_LISTLINE
